job_description: APPLICATIONS ENGINEER COOPAbout the JobLocation: Burnaby, BCAPPLY WITH RESUME AND TRANSCRIPT TO JOB # 1089115001Responsibilities:Reporting to the Manager of Applications Engineering Group (CPD), you can look forward to working on a team of senior Applications engineers:• Helping generate and maintain a suite of new collateral focused on the technology for PMC-Sierra’s latest telecom devices.  The collateral ranges from application notes and white papers to reference design hardware architecture and design documents• Working with Tier 1 OEMs in pre-sales and post-win roles, where you will be helping to understand and develop architectural solutions and HW designs in order to characterize customer related problems and to provide timely customer technical support and engineering feedback• Gaining in depth exposure to networking protocols such as Ethernet, SONET/SDH and OTN• Developing testing and troubleshooting skills associated with tcl scripts, target hardware, telecommunications testers and networking equipment
job_requirements: Qualifications• Working towards a Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent• Excellent verbal and written communications and strong interpersonal skills• Previous programming work term experience in C/C++ or scripting• Strong problem solving and hands-on debugging skills• Keen interest in working with our Telecom Networking semiconductor productsAdditional assets:• Experience with telecom networking communications protocols (Ethernet, TCP/IP, 802.11, 802.16, ATM, PDH, SONET/SDH, OTN)• Development and debugging experience in C• Familiarity with scripting languages (tcl/tk, perl)• Experience with UNIX/Linux Operating Systems• Experience with test equipment, tools and techniques for board-level debug• Experience with Telecom testing equipmentOpen To All Majors:No
